page.title: 10FARM VISIT __ COMMENTS..
page.content:
'They have six tractors,two John Deeres,three Massey Fergusons and a Fordson.Other machinery includes a silager,roller,slurry spreader,muck spreader,straw cutter,weed sprayer, grass cutter,hedge cutter and baler.'
The farmer on opening the silage shed door said,'Don't step one foot in there or else you will smell for a month!'
'Some farmers put an acid with the silage to help it break up, but after a nasty accident to his arm the farmer has decided not to use it again!'
'The next day the farmer 'phoned school and told us that cow ninety one had had a heifer calf and we were happy.'
